channel.title: Need tips that a web designer & programmer would need!
channel.description: Im really trying my best to become a designer the most because Im extremely short on creativity. I figure if I become a designer I can have more proficient sites for myself in the future when i become a programmer. Please post tips, i already got my note pad next to me to write them down.

item.title: Need tips that a web designer & programmer would need!
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Smashing Magazine – 31 Jan 08

10 Principles Of Good Website Design

**Usability** and the utility, not the visual design, determine the success or failure of a web-site. Since the visitor of the page is the only person who clicks the mouse and therefore decides everything, user-centric design has established as a...

Keep up with web design sites.

http://alistapart.com/

Moz

SEO Software, Tools & Resources for Smarter Marketing

Backed by the largest community of SEOs on the planet, Moz builds tools that make SEO, inbound marketing, link building, and content marketing easy. Start your free 30-day trial today!


http://www.stopdesign.com/

For designing sites, w3schools is a great web tutorial.

item.title: Need tips that a web designer & programmer would need!
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

I guess i could be considered a great designer, but i have no creativity at all still. All of my designs either suck or are based off of a program(or an OS ;D).

Tip: You should own Photoshop or at least paint.net.
